site.description: The main MouseFeed Eclipse Update server.

category-def.name: MouseFeed
category-def.label: MouseFeed Plugin
category-def.description: MouseFeed Eclipse plugin. Helps to remember keyboard shortcuts. Shows a popup with the keyboard shortcut for the actions called with a menu or a toolbar button.

category-def.name: Click Close
category-def.label: Click Close Plugin
category-def.description: Speeds up tabs closing, allowing to close them with a middle click. Closing tabs this way is much faster than using the tab close button, because of the much bigger target area.
